did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Field Camp in the Helderbergs 1900 to 1909, 1994.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: The field camp was conducted annually by Professor Gilbert D. Harris, Professor of Paleontology and Stratigraphic Geology at Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Article describing a geological and paleontological field camp held near the Helderbergs of New York State

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: William R. Brice. Field Camp in the Helderbergs 1900 to 1909, #700-131. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
